title: Multi-User Isolation
description: As a user, I want my data isolated from other users so that my portfolio is private.
acceptance_criteria: Two users in different browsers see different data
Creating item in one vault does not affect another
Invalid vault_id cannot access other vaults

technical_notes.isolation_strategy: Each vault has separate SQLite file, dynamic repo binding per request
technical_notes.testing: Add integration tests for concurrent requests across 2+ vaults, verify no data leakage
technical_notes.async_safety: Ensure Tasks and PubSub handlers maintain correct repo binding
